# Other Research Experience

## PhD Intern, [Max Planck Social Neuroscience Lab - Tania Singer](https://www.social.mpg.de/2766/en) (2023/10–2024/05)

```{r experience_new, include = TRUE,eval=TRUE}
data <- rbind(
  
  tibble(
    what = "Edu:Social School: Strengthening Resilience and Social Skills Among Teachers",
    URL = "https://www.edusocial-project.de/en/",
    when = "2023/10-2024/05",
    with = "Max Planck Social Neuroscience Lab",
    where = "Berlin, Germany",
    details = c("Contributed to conceiving research design, formulating hypotheses, designing new tasks, \\& reviewing litterature",
                "Contributed to admin documents: clinical trial, preregistration, ethics, senate application, etc.",
                "Topic 1: Social emotions (empathy and compassion)",
                "Topic 2: Social interactions (egocentric social network analysis)")))

data <- data %>% 
  mutate(what = link(what, URL, color = "333333"))

detailed_entries(data, with, when, what, where, details, .protect = FALSE)

```
